title: LA Tenants Expropriate their Landlord
itunes:title: LA Tenants Expropriate their Landlord
description:
Chris talks with Janis Yue and Anahy about how Hillside Villa tenants forced the LA city council to agree to buy their apartment building from their landlord.

 

IG: @hillsidevilla_

Twitter: @hillside_villa

Facebook: Hillside Villa Tenants Association
